body:
When a spell or effect is cast and the target is one of 2 or more identical permanents, I have no idea which permanent is targeted. When you want to respond with an instant or an activated ability to make it indestructible or prevent damage, it turns into a guessing game.

--------------
This happened to me:

Me:
2x Abuna Acolyte (T: prevent 1 damage)

Opponent:
Zealot il-Vec (Shadow; when it deals damage to opponent you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature instead)

Opponent "redirects" damage to Abuna Acolyte, or so the text says. But which one ? I guessed wrong, I assumed the one more on the left. They were both untapped and unbuffed.
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: Ambiguous target when there are 2+ permanents with the same name

comments.body: I've experience something similar before. Thanks for bringing this up to our attention.
